src:
V Kranju narasla Sava odrgala del zidu
Gibanje na tistem območju so prepovedali.
06 Nov 2019, 13:57 by T. V.
KRANJ – Padavine, ki zadnje dni izdatno močijo Slovenijo, tudi danes povzročajo težave.



Ob 11.20 je ob Gorenjesavski cesti v Kranju reka Sava odtrgala del podpornega zidu. Gasilci GARS Kranj so zavarovali kraj dogodka in prepovedali gibanje na tamkajšnjem območju. Zaradi bližine plinovoda so posredovali tudi delavci Plinovoda.O težavah zaradi meteorne vode poročajo tudi iz Kopra. Ob 9.52 so v Prečni ulici v Oplotnici gasilci PGD Oplotnica iz kletnih prostorov stanovanjske hiše izčrpali približno pet kubičnih metrov vode. Ob 7.50 so v Solkanu gasilci JZGRD Nova Gorica izčrpali vodo iz stanovanjskega objekta. Ob 7.13 so na izviru reke Rižane zaradi povišanega pretoka vode gasilci JZ GB Koper odstranili vodne pregrade.Mura pa je ob 7.00 v Ižakovcih v občini Beltinci naplavila večje drevo, ki se je ujelo v brod. Posredovali so gasilci PGD Ižakovci in s tehničnim posegom drevo razžagali in odstranili.
text:
In Kranj, the grown Sava ripped off part of the wall
Movement in the area was banned.
06 Nov 2019, 12:57 by T.V.
KRANJ - The rainfall that has been plentifully invigorating Slovenia over the last few days is causing problems today.



At 11.20, the Sava River tore off part of the retaining wall along the Gorenjesavska Road in Kranj. GARS Kranj firefighters secured the scene and banned movement in the area. Due to the proximity of the pipeline, the employees of the pipeline also reported. At 9.52am, in Prečna ulica in Oplotnica, PGD Oplotnica firefighters pumped about five cubic meters of water from the basement of the apartment building. At 7.50 in Solkan, firefighters from the Nova Gorica SEZG pumped water from a residential building. At 7.13 am, at the source of the Rižana River, due to the increased flow of water, firefighters from the SW GB Koper removed the water barriers. PGD Ižakovci firefighters intervened and, through technical intervention, the tree was cut and removed.
